page.title: 10ANNUAL EVENTS IN ALDBOROUGH
page.content: Clive says Aldborough Fair takes place during the week including 21st.June for four days.It takes two days to set up.It used to be a horse fair and covered both parts of The Green but is smaller now.There are dodgems,waltzers swing-boats,rifle-range,darts,candy floss and various slot machines. The fair is run by Mr Grey,who has the right to be on The Green since before World War Two.During the war he always left one caravan there on 21st.June as his right to run a fair. Natalie writes about Aldborough'85,an annual event.Her mother is the Chairman and Claire's father started the idea a few years ago.Held on The Green with trade stalls,side-shows, craft exhibitions and refreshments with money going to charity.
